DOC.brief_summary: The treatment of ADHD in jail will help the prisoners in their rehabilitation process
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Prisoners With Attention Deficit Hyperactive Disorder in Trondheim Prison
DOC.detailed_description: Prisoners with ADHD will be offered treatment with Stratera, and we wanted to study their use of the prisons rehabilitation offers as school, programs and work training before and after treatment with Stratera.
DOC.criteria: All prisoners that fullfill the diagnostic criterias for ADHD All other prisoners
